problem_text_cn: 空心圆柱管的尺寸如图所示。外径2.3厘米。内径为2.0厘米。长度是15厘米。这管子是由一种特别坚固的金属制成的。如果1 (cm)^3的金属重5.5g，计算管子的重量，使你的答案精确到小数点后一位。
problem_text_en:
A hollow cylindrical pipe has the dimensions shown in the figure. The outer diameter is 2.3 centimeters. The inner diameter is 2.0 centimeters. The length is 15 centimeters.

The pipe is made of a particularly strong metal.

Calculate the weight of the pipe if 1 (cm)^3 of the metal weighs 5.5g , giving your answer correct to one decimal place.
